data.title: Zrenjanin, first city awarded by ACES Europe in Serbia
data.meta_description: The City of Zrenjanin is the first city from Republic of Serbia to be declared with the award European City of Sport 2021 and was invited to join ACES Europe
data.text:
The City of Zrenjanin is the first city from Republic of Serbia to be declared with the award European City of Sport 2021 and was invited to join ACES Europe (European Capitals and Cities of Sport Federation), with HQ in Brussels.

After digital evaluation conducted this summer the City of Zrenjanin was officially recognized as a good example of the city that follows all the goals highlighted by ACES Europe and which has developed successful sports policy with a variety of content, programs and activities for its citizens and top athletes.

All awarded European cities were invited b to attend at ACES Europe Gala Ceremony 2020 at the end of the year, in the European Parliament in Brussels, at which Zrenjanin will be awarded with the flag and the title of European City of Sport 2021.
